about.description:
I'm a Full Stack Developer.
My journey before was different, I graduated as a dentist and soon realized that was too static for my adventurous spirit.
I decided to travel and break out of my comfort zone to open my mind to new cultures.
One year in Sweden and another in Germany, I gained valuable work experience abroad and improved my English.
These experiences led me to look for my a new passion: programming.
about.strengths_description:
My bravery in stepping out of my comfort zone
My ability to adapt quickly to any situation
My quick aptitude for acquiring new knowledge
My effective communication skills within teams.
about.future_description: I am actively seeking a new challenging project to contribute all that I have learned so far.

projects.sportiverse_card: Online Web Reservation System for a sports complex, enabling users to book slots, make payments, and provide feedback.
projects.pokemon_card: Website for Pokémon enthusiasts, allowing them to explore characteristics and create their own.
projects.m4life_card: Microbes for Life's website, dedicated to developing microbiological solutions for agriculture and the environment.
projects.todo_card: A task organization app to plan your days with added tasks, modifications, and category selections for efficient daily management.

pokemon.description1: In this project, I've built a web application that fetches Pokémon data from an API and showcases them on the homepage.
pokemon.description2: The app offers a user-friendly sorting and filtering system for easy Pokémon exploration.
pokemon.description3: Additionally, users can create, edit, and delete custom characters with a validated form.
pokemon.description4: Explore the Pokémon world and enjoy an interactive experience with this engaging web app.

sportiverse.description2: Reservate using a React calendar and pay through Mercado Pago.
sportiverse.description4: User dashboards to manage reservations, leave reviews, and update personal information.
sportiverse.description5: Admin dashboard to offer easy management.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: If you have any questions or would like to work with me, feel free to contact me.
contact.name: Full name
